title: Suspect in Paris shooting transferred to psychiatric unit
description: Authorities say the 69-year-old suspect, who allegedly killed three people, was removed from custody for health reasons.

title: Christmas returns to Bethlehem after two years of COVID curbs
description: Tourists flock to the occupied West Bank city to celebrate Christmas after pandemic restrictions were lifted.

title: What’s behind the Unite India March?
description: The opposition Congress Party says its rally aims to highlight what it calls the 'danger' of the ruling BJP.

title: India opposition’s ‘unity march’ against hate reaches New Delhi
description: Cross-country march enters capital where Congress leader Rahul Gandhi attacks BJP for 'spreading Hindu-Muslim hatred'.

title: Iraq launches ticket sales for upcoming Gulf Cup in Basra
description: The 2023 Gulf Cup will be the first major football tournament held in Iraq for 40 years.

title: Nine killed in fuel tanker explosion near Johannesburg: Official
description: The tanker transporting liquefied petroleum gas got stuck under a bridge, according to officials and media reports.

title: Taliban orders NGOs to send women workers home
description: Ban comes days after Taliban-run government ordered universities to suspend classes for women until further notice.

title: Migrants face freezing Christmas at US-Mexico border
description: Migrants almost certain to spend Christmas in crowded shelters or on streets of Mexican border towns amid winter storm.

title: Thousands of flights cancelled due to winter storm in the US
description: Heavy snow and howling winds close highways, ground flights and cause misery for Christmas travellers.

title: Wild winter storm in US disrupts Christmas travel
description: Blizzards, freezing rain, flooding and life-threatening cold create mayhem for those travelling for the holidays.

title: ‘Tis the season: The post-World Cup Christmas blues
description: For some of us, the World Cup consumed so much festive joy that there is little left for Christmas.

title: Kurdish protesters call for justice after deadly Paris shooting
description: A gunman went on a rampage in 10th district, killing three people in attack aimed at foreigners, authorities say.

title: This Christmas, make sure your chocolate does not harm the planet
description: Our insatiable demand for chocolate is destroying forests.

title: Soaring living costs drain Christmas joy for families in Nigeria
description: Locals say rising travel and food costs have made the holiday season more expensive and are keeping families apart.

title: ‘An empty seat at the table’: Christmas without Shireen Abu Akleh
description: She was a renowned journalist, but to her niece, Shireen was a Christmas-loving aunt and the ‘backbone' of the family.

title: India makes negative COVID test mandatory for five countries
description: Travellers arriving from countries, including China, will have to show a negative COVID-19 test to enter the country.

title: UN chief says Burkina Faso has no grounds to expel envoy
description: Statement comes after military government ordered senior UN official Barbara Manzi to leave Burkina Faso immediately.

title: Photos: How COVID roils small Chinese towns
description: With intensive care units overwhelmed, patients are forced to go to bigger cities for treatment.

title: Dollar dominance: What’s next for the greenback?
description: The US dollar has been on the rise in 2022. What is next for the greenback, gold and cryptocurrencies?

title: At least 22 killed in fire at Russian home for elderly
description: The care home in Siberia was unregistered and the authorities are now inspecting similar facilities.

title: Canada polar bears declining at alarming rate, study finds
description: Researchers say there has been a dramatic drop in particular in the number of female bears and cubs in Hudson Bay.

title: Photos: How 2022 became a ‘pivot year’ for clean energy
description: The global energy crisis triggered by the Ukraine war and increasing climate threats have fuelled the transition.

title: What Ukraine can learn from the Khmer Rouge trial
description: As Ukraine seeks justice for crimes committed by Russia, Cambodia could offer lessons — and cautionary tales.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 304
description: As the Russia-Ukraine war enters its 304th day, we take a look at the main developments.

title: Bill Gates: Not competing with new generation, but with malaria
description: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation’s co-chair discusses if the world is ready for another health emergency.

title: Elderly leave cities as COVID-19 infections surge in China
description: Families tell of sending elderly relatives away from China's cities amid reports of surging infections and deaths.

title: Sitiveni ‘Rambo’ Rabuka confirmed as Fiji’s new prime minister
description: Outgoing Prime Minister Frank Bainimarama said after losing nomination vote: 'This is democracy and this is my legacy.'

title: Russia accused of war crimes cover-up by razing Ukraine theatre
description: Ukraine says at least 300 people were killed when Russia bombed Mariupol's drama theatre where civilians had sheltered.

title: Ukraine’s Zelenksyy warns of Russian attacks over Christmas
description: The Ukrainian president also issued a warning to Russian people that 'terror never goes without a response'.

title: US judge denies diplomatic immunity for Maduro ally Alex Saab
description: Saab, a close ally of Venezuela's President Nicolas Maduro, claims he was on a diplomatic mission to Iran when arrested.

title: ‘The junta is heartless’: Landmine victims blame Myanmar military
description: Myanmar's military accused of deliberately planting landmines to target civilians as armed resistance movement grows.

title: Republican lawsuit over Arizona attorney general race struck down
description: A United States judge ruled that Republican Abraham Hamadeh failed to prove claims about errors in vote counting.
